entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
